results.title: Metformin in Reproductive Biology
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment reinstates menstrual cyclicity, decreases the incidence of cesareans, and limits the number of @<m>DISEASE_Ichthyosis_prematurity_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536271 @@@premature@@@ births.

citations.NLM: Faure M, Bertoldo MJ, Khoueiry R, Bongrani A, Brion F, Giulivi C, Dupont J, Froment P. Metformin in Reproductive Biology Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2018;9():675. PMID: 30524372

results.title: Pregnancy outcomes in women with gestational diabetes treated with metformin or insulin: a case-control study.
results.text_hl: Neonatal morbidity was improved in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group; @<m>DISEASE_Ichthyosis_prematurity_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536271 @@@prematurity@@@ (0 vs. 10%, P < 0.01), @DISEASE_Jaundice_Neonatal @DISEASE_MESH:D007567 @@@neonatal jaundice@@@ (8 vs. 30%, P < 0.01) and admission to neonatal unit (6 vs. 19%, P < 0.01).

citations.NLM: Balani J, Hyer SL, Rodin DA, Shehata H. Pregnancy outcomes in women with gestational diabetes treated with metformin or insulin: a case-control study. Diabet Med. 2009 Aug;26(8):798-802. PMID: 19709150
